time: 1-00:00:0			; Time amount you need to complete your job. Maximum 15 days
12:00:00                                         # time allocation, which has the format (D-HH:MM), here set to 1 hou
23:00:00                                         # time allocation, which has the format (D-HH:MM), here set to 1 hou
2-23:00:00                                         # time allocation, which has the format (D-HH:MM), here set to 1 hou
mem_per_cpu: 10G  # amount of memory the job requires, default is 2G
20G  # amount of memory the job requires, default is 2G
15G  # amount of memory the job requires, default is 2G
gres: gpu:1				; GPU number you want to use
gpu:1         # Include gpu for the task (only for GPU jobs)              # Total memory limit (optional)
{% if gpu_resource_name %}{{ gpu_resource_name }}{% else %}gpu{% endif %}:{{ gpu_per_node }}
atlas1%atlas2        Optional      The job will require both the atlas1 and atlas2 Lustre® filesystems to be online.
{% if gpu_resource_name %}{{ gpu_resource_name }}{% else %}gpu{% endif %}:{{ gpu_per_node }}
memory: $mem$mem_unit >> sbatch.$$.tmp  # total memory requested (Note this is different than --mem-per-cpu option.
